comment.author: 16333811@N00
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Flickr Commons, and we'd love to have this added to the group! If you have not already joined the group, please do so, and be sure to say Hi in your thread!

comment.author: 15885731@N00
comment._content: Wow. Was the text in quotes from inside the passport, or was is it from the same collection?

comment.author: 14314789@N03
comment._content: FYI: The handwritten text below the textfield says: "Dringlichkeitsbescheinigung über 50 km ausgestellt", "Certification of urgency issued for 50 kilometres".

comment.author: 7304977@N02
comment._content:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/photosharp]The text is from speaking with Ms. Rome at an event where collected materials for this collection. The Road Shows captured digital copies of these fabulous images along with the stories behind them.
- A, former JWA Digital Archivist
